Directions: In a large bowl, combine the first four ingredients. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well.  Shape into 1-1/2-in. balls. In a large oven-proof skillet, brown meatballs; drain. Combine sauce ingredients; pour over meatballs. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until meat is no longer pink.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
